title: XCOM.2.Update.1.and.Crack
description:
Install instructions:
- Copy contents of the Update folder to your main game dir
- Copy contents of the Crack folder to your main game dir
- Navigate to XCOM 2BinariesWin64
- Run CPUID.Patch.bat to create the executable
- Create a shortcut from XCOM2.exe and add -noRedScreens -review to the target of shortcut
- Run the game from the shortcut
Credits: thanks to demde for the update and sam2k8 for the crack!

Notes: 
- Run the included Steam.Registry.Key.reg, if the Steam client is not installed on your PC!
- If CPUID patch freezes, go to windows region and language setting, then administrative tab and set the system locale to English (US) and restart your PC.

PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!
